This dress is lightweight, a pretty dress style, and the material see through a little bit. It’s a really pretty dress and I was excited when I took it out of its package. The only reason I’m rating it 3 stars and had to return it was that it didn’t look good on my body type. I have wider hips and that’s where the fabric protruded out and made me look like a cup cake. I strictly didn’t like how it looked on me which is why I’m giving it 3 stars. However the quality of the dress was very nice and very pretty. I recommend this dress for any women who don’t have wide hips, then maybe the dress will sit better and not make you look like a desert.

评论详情: This dress is adorable. I bought it for an upcoming cruise and when I put it on I didn't want to take it off. It is so comfortable and flows. I hate buying clothes because I am very large busted (40H bra size) with a 16 pant size so things are to big or to small so I never feel pretty.  I'm so glad I took a chance on this piece.
Color is not the same, this is darker blue and orange. Fit does not work in the breast area, button is too high and leaves large gaping hole.

I bought 5 dresses from Amazon to try on for an upcoming wedding. This was by far my favorite!! I ended up ordering it in 2 more colors that I was eying to see which one I want to keep for the wedding.  I am wearing a large in all three. I did notice some size inconsistencies across the colors. The purple was quite a bit larger than the other two. There is an option at the v neck to close it higher up and make it more conservative. I plan to wear dress tape to keep mine in place where I want it.  It is very light weight and for my body type, hits in all of the right places to be extremely flattering yet comfortable. I know I would feel pretty, confident, and comfortable in this on a day where I’m bloated as well, which is HUGE!  I know it will be perfect for summer time and plan to keep warm with tights and a coat for winter/fall wedding.
Wore it the next day I got it and got a lot of compliments. Colors super pretty and fits great!
The dress was perfect for the occasion. The material was very comfortable,  lose and flowy .The text tile has a huge imperfections. Near the side seem.

评论概述: Decent for the price but thin
评论详情: More ideal for warmer weather with the thin material and the lining is a bit short but otherwise the quality was decent! Colors of the print were nice and vibrant. Larger bust ladies may have some issues with gapping at the top

评论概述: Perfect, even if you are short
评论详情: I was a bit hesitant about purchasing this dress online, especially when it comes to sizing. I’m 5 feet tall, 160 pounds with a bit of a gut, and I really didn’t want to end up looking like a round blob or have my boobs spilling out. I also wanted to find something that would cover my arms and stomach because I’m not a fan of showing those areas. This dress turned out to be exactly what I was hoping for! It fit perfectly and had the flowy sleeves I was looking for, offering great coverage without feeling bulky.  The length was perfect for my height—just grazing the top of my feet when I wore wedges. If it’s a little long for you with wedges, the waist is constructed in a way that you can pull it up slightly to shorten the dress a tad more. The dress is a beautiful pink color, and I received lots of compliments throughout the day, which made me feel so pretty.  One thing I wasn’t thrilled about was that the bottom was a bit sheer, with a slit that exposed more than I was comfortable with, especially since I have spider veins and prefer to keep my legs covered. I had no trouble taking it to my local seamstress, and for just $7, she sealed up the slit for me, which was an easy fix.  The dress does come with a built-in slip, but I added a shorter slip underneath to avoid a "Princess Di" moment—especially since it was an outdoor wedding...just in case. Overall, this dress was the perfect choice for me. I felt confident, comfortable, and, most importantly, pretty!

I ordered a size Small and I’d say it’s very true to size, light dress for those warmer days. It has a lot of stretch and the color was stunning. Not a warm dress so I wouldn’t wear this unless you plan to be inside if it’s colder. Very versatile, no pockets & doesn’t cling to your skin like most. Loved it!

the dress looks nice and flowy, and despite the fact I had to resew the hidden button so my boobs won't fall out or I have weird flap, I would've said it's a good dress, but it started getting snagging lines in visible places after I tried it on just two times (I am very careful). this is one-time-wear dress, and it's a shame that fabric doesn't last, because the dress looks fine.

I purchased this dress specifically to wear for a 1st Birthday photo shoot with my son. It was absolutely stunning in the pictures, and I was so thankful I decided to wear this dress, as it is completely out of my comfort zone. Still being a fairly new mom, I’m self-conscious about my tummy, my upper arms, and my body in general, and this dress successfully hid all of my insecurities.  I am 5’4”, I weigh 185lbs., and I like my clothes to be loose, so I tend to wear a 2x or size 16. I’m pretty sure wearing this dress was the first time I felt beautiful again since the birth of my son. It definitely is not really an everyday dress, and it is a little more fancy, like for a nice dinner, a wedding, church, etc.  The dress is well made, and even in the sun, it was not sheer or see-through. I was amazed at how comfortable I felt wearing it, and one of my favorite parts was the little snap at the top to keep it closed, and it was in the perfect location for me! I can’t rave on this dress enough!! You definitely will want to plan on taking time to steam the wrinkles out of the entire dress, because they do show up pretty significantly when the it first arrives. If you are looking for a feminine and dainty look… BUY THIS!!
Absolutely love this dress and the quality. I was going to buy a very similar dress from another website but came across this for a fraction of the cost. It’s very flattering, and comfortable.
Got this dress for my little sis baby shower. She love this dress. Very comfortable and pretty. Great material and is loose. She's 8 months pregnant and she wanted a long dress.

I took off the clasp and sewed it back on, it was easy and looked better on my body type. If I didn’t take the claps off, I would have left the claps undone and wore it. I purchased this dress to wear on a cruise. It’s lightweight & so pretty. I’m 5’6 & the inside liner is long enough for me. I love the sleeves. It did come with the belt “holder” on one side not attached. I wear a size 12 & L fit well. Worth the money.

I bought it for Easter and will end up cutting off the top of the dress, using part of the bodice to make a waistband and make it into a skirt. But still covers enough I can wear shape wear under it & a real bra!! I love it! I never write reviews, but this deserved one for sure.

I really liked this dress. I bought it for a wedding, and it was dress number 5 that I've purchased and the first one I won't be returning. The colors were accurate and beautiful. I didn't have the hemline issue that some people seemed to have - my dress seems to be made well. The waist is a bit higher than on the model, but that doesn't bother me. I like empire waist on me, so that's all good.  My only slight complaint is that the lining is a bit short. It hits me on the top of my thigh, and due to being "gifted" in the booty area, I'm a little worried about it being too short when it's time to wear it. I may cut it out and wear a longer slip instead.  I'm normally a size 16 jeans. I bought an XL and it fit true to size.

I've seen this dress all over Instagram, so I expected a winner. Nope. This went right back in the package for a return. 1) atrociously sewn hem - 3" variance between the left and right side. One side dragged on the ground, the other was above my ankle bone. 2) lining is very short. I'm not tall at all, but it barely covered my backside. 3) shoulder seams were sewn crooked, so it looked lopsided. 4) super high waist, almost like an empire or maternity style, even on my average torso. The elastic was right up under my bust.  I gave 2 stars instead of 1 because the colors are beautiful. Exactly as displayed in the stock image. The fit in genenral is true to size (aside from issues mentioned). (I'm 5'6", a proportioned size 14 on bottom, XL on top and bought a Large.)

评论概述: Don’t go by the size guide.
评论详情: It’s a lovely dress and I bought it to wear to my daughter’s wedding. Nice flowing fabric and a pretty soft green. I wasn’t sure on size so I went by reviews, not the size guide. I normally wear a size 12 or 14 and purchased the XL. It is very roomy and I could have gone down a size

Bought this dress on a limited deal and was pleased with the deep navy color. It’s a great length for me and the slit is not too high on the leg.  Two reasons I dropped a star were for bust area and belt. If you are top heavy, you will need to wear a tank underneath. It’s not a true wrap, more of a faux where an elastic waist sits under the bust area. There is a little snap to provide “modesty,” but it popped like a champagne cork. The belt was ridiculously looped onto one side and was impossible to undo while wearing the dress. Very delicate belt loop. I took the dress off so I wouldn’t break the loop and it broke anyway.  The fabric does need a steam or an iron, so not what I would call travel friendly. BUT the SC humidity did help me out with the worst wrinkles.
I love the fabric, the way that fits and easy care. Absolutely love it.
I took this dress for a bridal trip to Lake Tahoe. The dress was comfortable, yet formal enough to wear out to a nice dinner or walk along the lake. Highly recommend and fits true to size.
This dress exceeded my expectations. Quality fabric, comfortable but very stylish and definitely worth the money. I’ve washed it a few times in delicate setting and it’s still as new.

I’ve worn this out a few times this past spring/summer. It is airy and flowy; it fits as expected and hasn’t disappointed me in the slightest!

I wore the dress for less than 3 hours and the tie holder on the side broke and there's the button to keep your cleavage from popping out.  It was just hanging on. 评论概述: Fits nicely, nice material for the summer
评论详情: I'm 5'6 and 195 lbs. It looks nice on me. I like the snap at the neckline, I can have it snapped if I don't want to show any cleavage or unsnapped if I do want to show cleavage. When unsnapped it still lays nicely and you don't see the snap. The first layer of material underneath goes to my knees and the outer material goes to my ankles. You can see my legs a little through the outer material but not to much. I'm very pleased with this purchase and delivery was very fast.
